document.full_text: the pentagon is very encouraged by wall street's response to aerospace companies and arms makers, even as defense spending flattens, the top u.s. weapons buyer said on tuesday.
document.title: pentagon buoyed by wall street view of defense stocks
lines_and_colors: the pentagon is very encouraged by wall street's response to aerospace companies and arms makers, even as defense spending flattens, the top u.s. weapons buyer said on tuesday.
